title: Serene Spring Day
description: A bright, tranquil spring day with blooming flowers and lush greenery. The sun casts a gentle, restorative light over the courtyard.
cone_prompt: An orange colored cone on the flat ground.
foreground_prompt: Ground covered in moist brown dirt, fresh green grass, and vibrant pebbles, with the tarmac sparkling slightly from recent rain.
background_prompt: A bright, tranquil spring day with blooming flowers and lush greenery. The sun casts a gentle, restorative light over the courtyard.

title: Dusk Shadows
description: A bright dusk scene with the sun setting low, casting long, creeping shadows and a calm, contemplative atmosphere over the courtyard.
cone_prompt: An orange colored cone on the flat ground.
foreground_prompt: Ground is cool with patches of brown dirt, softly lit pebbles, and tarmac, all gradually losing their detail in the waning light.
background_prompt: A bright dusk scene with the sun setting low, casting long, creeping shadows and a calm, contemplative atmosphere over the courtyard.
